note.p: Fragment in the Cambridge University Libraries, Taylor-Schechter Collection. Covers Bava Qamma 2:1 - 3:5; 10:9 - 10; Bava Metsi'a 1:1 - 2:5
Transcription from online images of the manuscript, available at http://jnul.huji.ac.il/dl/talmud/mishna/selmimnu.asp and at https://fgp.genizah.org. FGP nos. C166192-C166195
Supplied text based on Kaufmann ms, Library of the Hungarian Academy of Sciences, Kaufmann A50, except when preserved remains make such restoration unlikely.
